issue.title: [Rust]: Fix null value reading in jsonreader for both dictionary and stringbuilders
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10393](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10393). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is a problem with reading nested null values for listarrays with both normal string builders and dictionary builders

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10393?focusedCommentId=17221935) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8531
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8531>
